title: Participatory Interview Skills Training for Advanced Science Leaders

context.prior_knowledge: Over ten years of science-related work experience, leadership, and management competencies
context.additional_context: Customized education for science field managers/leaders combining smartphone-based online learning with face-to-face workshops

learning_goals: Learners can apply five core interview techniques (STAR-based questioning, situational analysis, non-verbal communication, critical feedback delivery, and in-depth exploratory questioning) in practical contexts.
Based on peer feedback, learners can revise and improve interview scripts three or more times to develop customized question sets tailored to real-world scenarios.
By analyzing recorded mock interview videos, learners can identify three or more aspects of their communication style and create improvement plans.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
